channel.title: Because of the SFM:BM content release - are other dev teams allowed to use BM content
channel.description:
I've been curious of this for a long time now, but I never asked so I thought I would. Is the BM team sharing their content with (for instance) the Op:BM or Guard Duty team? Are the devs allowing this content to be used in other mods/remakes?
If not, does the SFM: Black Mesa DLC now give them permission to use that content in their games? Or is that CCL only for SFM use?

item.title: Because of the SFM:BM content release - are other dev teams allowed to use BM content
item.dc:creator: Keresh
item.description:
Deathmonkey7:

No, they can’t and they don’t want to use BM’s assets.

That’s all you need to know.

Read full topic
item.source: Because of the SFM:BM content release - are other dev teams allowed to use BM content

item.title: Because of the SFM:BM content release - are other dev teams allowed to use BM content
item.dc:creator: Deathmonkey7
item.description:
BuzzKillington:

I’ve been curious of this for a long time now, but I never asked so I thought I would. Is the BM team sharing their content with (for instance) the Op:BM or Guard Duty team? Are the devs allowing this content to be used in other mods/remakes?

If not, does the SFM: Black Mesa DLC now give them permission to use that content in their games? Or is that CCL only for SFM use?

No, they can’t and they don’t want to use BM’s assets.
